price: (36) And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ
